casebody.data:
Thursday, December 13, 2001

MEDIATION DOCKET

99-570. DeRolph v. State.

Perry C.P. No. 22043. This cause is pending before the court upon the granting of a motion for reconsideration.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that Howard S. Bellman be appointed as master commissioner in this matter.

Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Cook, JJ., dissent.
